# BusTickets.ph

> Philippine bus and ferry ticket booking guide. Book tickets online for Victory Liner, 2Go, OceanJet, and 50+ operators.

## About This Site
BusTickets.ph helps travelers find and book bus and ferry tickets across the Philippines. We provide schedules, prices, terminal guides, and online booking through our partner 12Go.

## Main Sections

### Routes
Travel guides between cities with schedules, operators, and booking:
- /route/manila-to-baguio: Bus from Manila to Baguio (Victory Liner, Genesis, Partas)
- /route/cebu-to-bohol: Ferry from Cebu to Tagbilaran/Tubigon (OceanJet, Lite)
- /route/el-nido-to-coron: Ferry between Palawan islands
- /route/manila-to-legazpi: Bus to Bicol region

### Destinations
How to get to popular Philippine destinations:
- /destination/siargao: Surfing capital, via Surigao ferry
- /destination/sagada: Mountain province, via Manila bus
- /destination/siquijor: Mystic island, via Dumaguete ferry
- /destination/boracay: Beach resort, via Caticlan

### Operators
Bus and ferry company guides with schedules and routes:
- /operator/victory-liner: Largest bus operator, Manila-Baguio-North Luzon
- /operator/2go-travel: Major ferry operator, inter-island routes
- /operator/oceanjet: Fast ferry, Visayas region
- /operator/dltb: Bus to Bicol and Southern Luzon

### Terminals
Terminal locations, directions, and facilities:
- /terminal/pitx: Para√±aque Integrated Terminal Exchange
- /terminal/cubao: Multiple terminals in Quezon City
- /terminal/batangas-port: Ferry port to Mindoro, Visayas

## Key Facts
- Coverage: 50+ bus and ferry operators
- Routes: 600+ routes across Philippines
- Booking: Online tickets via 12Go partner
- Languages: English, Filipino

## Contact
Website: https://bustickets.ph
